text: Patricia Fleming was a member of the Arizona House of Representatives from 2009 through 2011. She was elected to the House in November 2008. She ran for re-election in 2010, but was defeated. In the 2012 election, she ran for the Arizona State Senate, in District 14, but lost to incumbent Gail Griffin. ==References== Category:Arizona Democrats Category:Members of the Arizona House of Representatives Category:Women state legislators in Arizona Category:Candidates in the 2010 United States elections Category:Candidates in the 2012 United States elections Category:21st-century American politicians Category:21st-century American women politicians Category:Year of birth missing (living people) Category:Living people
title: Patricia Fleming (Arizona politician)
